day_one.title: Cook Off!
day_one.body: There will two rounds within each matchup; a savory round and a sweet round. The cooking competitions continue until one winner is identified.

day_one.title: Hula Hoop Circle
day_one.body: Have everyone form a circle and hold hands and put a hula hoop on the shoulder of one of the people. The goal of the activity is to get the hoop around all the members of the circle dropping hands.

day_one.title: Prank Wars
day_one.body: The pranks should be fun and harmless, but brew a sense of friendly mischief and competition.

day_one.title: The 80s Dance Off
day_one.body: A number of dancers compete against each other until a winner is declared, the 1980s style.

day_two.title: The Bridge Challenge
day_two.body: Each team will create a small bridge that can connect two books placed two feet apart. The team with the bridge that can hold the most weight will be crowned the winner.

day_two.title: Who's Baby Is That?
day_two.body: Have everyone bring in a baby picture of themselves. Hold a vote seeing if people can correctly match the pictures to their respective persons.

day_two.title: Scavenger Hunt
day_two.body: Clues all around the venue. The first team to find all clues and finish will be the winner.

day_two.title: Trivia Time!
day_two.body: Each team will have the opportunity to win a point if they are the first to correctly answer a question. First to 10 points wins. 3 rounds.
